txt.en: 'Gar, so you want to help out, eh? Ain't you a little too eager to be killed in the tournament? Gar, not my life, I suppose.'\n\n'Now, you'll be wanting to clean up the slop around here and pass out some Gredbyg drink. When you're done with that wake up those pesky sleeping snaga, will you! This ain't a hut for shuteye. You either bet or fight around here!'
Sleeping Orcs can be found in Thorzhaf.\n\nYou should complete the tasks that Maukatish has given you.
Maukatish can be found at Thorzhaf.\n\nYou should speak with Maukatish.
Slop and drink tables can be found in Thorzhaf.\n\nYou should complete the tasks that Maukatish has given you.
An Uruk in charge of the list of fighters for the pit-fighting tournament has a system of rules and is hard to sway.
'Gar, well I'll be, you actually did all those things?! You a strange Orc, Master Mangler, I'll say that much. I suppose a deal's a deal.'
